name: Pumpkin Hunter
description:
Welcome! This is a really tiny game, maybe 5 mins will be enough.

※※ Suggestion : Play this game with fullscreen to get better experience!  ※※

Arrow keys : Move

Z : Attack

X : Jump

R : Restart

-------

It's midnight of Halloween,  some evil creatures  appear unexpectedly.

As a powerful hunter, it's your job to keep this area safe!

-------

Assets I used in this game:

Zebestian - Halloween Music Pack 2018

Caz - PIXEL FANTASY RPG ICONS - Halloween

LHTeam - Zombie Toast

rvros - Animated Pixel Adventurer

...and other asset I bought on Humble Bundle.

Thanks for these amazing game asset creators make my dream possible!

-------

Wish you enjoy my game, and please feel free to leave any comments!

Happy Halloween : D
